Title: Generator emits modern AST nodes
Description: Update gen_absyntax.py to generate modern node classes and visitor declarations using VisitorResult.
Acceptance: Generated headers compile and expose new node/visitor declarations.

Title: Modern AST base headers
Description: Add Symbol/Token/List and Visitor headers under include/matiec/ast with ownership and dispatch semantics.
Acceptance: Headers compile and unit tests validate ownership/dispatch behavior.

Title: Legacy compatibility shim
Description: Add legacy_compat.hpp bridging legacy symbol_c/visitor_c to modern VisitorResult.
Acceptance: Legacy adapter compiles and unit tests validate result conversion.
